title: Pearl Enterprises M.T. ROLLER 1.5mm Micro Needle Roller Skin Care Therapy Dermatology System (Dermaroller)

title: Skin Roller 1.0 mm

title: Pearl Enterprises M.T. ROLLER .5mm Micro Needle Roller Skin Care Therapy Dermatology System (Dermaroller)
description: The Microneedle works for various skin issues to make you look younger, more vibrant and with a healthy glow.  Best of all, it can be used almost on the entire body.  It rids stretch marks, cellulite, wrinkles, acne and promotes hair re-growth.

title: DNS Biogenesis Eye Roller-vessel Sealing System- Titanium Alloy Derma Roller This roller has the same benefits of other 540 rollers. However these allow to acces small difficult areas ESPECIALLY the face! (0.50mm)
description:
At bioGenesis London, our skin scientists are proud to present the state of the art remedy for skin rejuvenation and scar treatments - The DNS Skin Roller.
Each and every DNS Skin Roller is crafted and assessed by hand to ensure that only the selected best are sold to our customers. Although this involves a great deal more labor power, but at bioGenesis London, we belief that product quality is the most important standalone factor to ensure our customer's satisfaction.
Solid Plate Structure (SPS)
The SPS technology of the DNS Skin Roller prevents liquid from leaking into the core of the roller which can in many case causes rust and growth of lethal bacteria.
Complete Disinfection
During the production of the DNS Skin Roller, components and equipments involved with manufacturing are disinfected over and over using different sterilization methods to ensure that all final products are free from germs and bacteria.
Air Tight Sealing
Subsequent to the final round of disinfection, The DNS Skin Roller is placed into its packaging for air tight seal. Once it is in the seal, it will remain disinfected until the seal is broken.
Ergonomic Design
The design of the DNS Skin Roller ensures that users are able to maintain a firm grip on the handle during treatment.

Needle Protection
The needles on the DNS Skin Rollers are protected by the specially made plastic head piece to make certain that the embedded needles are not damaged during the life span of the roller. Furthermore, the compact size of the protection piece guarantees easy storage.
